title: Rammus' Dance should scale with movement speed.
body: Also, it should keep him on his back permanently.

replies.body: https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-omaOgYXMbY4/WBSLcfT3gxI/AAAAAAAAXC4/vobfhm_z8io2Zm3Yow8CoMDpWhB_rMymgCLcB/s0/28.png
YEAH?

YEAH.

http://imgur.com/QdRX7hB
Ouuuuuiiiiiiiiii.
I love French Rammus. :3
Rammois?
C'est une bonne idée pour un nom. :P
Je nais comprend pas but ok
D'accord.
Ooooooouiiiiiiiiii

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=J08bP8pk,comment-id=0005000000000002000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-21T07:10:23.043+0000)
>
> C'est une bonne idée pour un **nom**. :P


you had me at nom

http://cdn.smosh.com/sites/default/files/bloguploads/patrick-nom_0.gif
LOL, close enough.

If it ain't on a plate, it can wait.

~~please dances scale to ms need to see with janna + sona + kled  + lulu on yi with ult and homeguard~~
https://media.giphy.com/media/3o8dp1M6GZXoDoqWEo/giphy.gif

And this confirmation will now spread like wildfire. Thank you!

But for the [sake](http://www.telegraph.co.uk/inluxury/2785/1378299312265/sake_japan_2459909ajpg/ALTERNATES/w940-land/Sake_Japan_2459909a.jpg) of the meme, let's gloss over that you neglected to mention _when_ it would happen. ;)
I neglected it 'cause I didn't know when we'd have it in. Good news is, if all goes well, we're looking at 7.13. :3
THIS IS ONE REASON WHY WE LOVE YOU
http://i.imgur.com/szsjfp8.gifv

even if its takes 8.1

long as it happens ill be happy. more so if he can stay on his back the whole time and just spin and spin and spin
No dice on the staying on his back, but he's gotta go fast when he dances now (with movespeed, ofc!)
well... 1 out of 2 is not bad <3
will master yi's project skin scale with movespeed now as well?
This is why you are my favorite rioter
Exgeniar should be your favorite, he hooked it up! I just bugged him about it and tested it, haha.
It's because of how communicative and passionate you are. I wish more rioters would learn from you lol
http://imgur.com/4wu6ErE
Fidgetspinner Rammus. Make it a thing.
Just remember that bamboozle = banboozle.
ok
You just stole my comment :(
it wasn't exactly an original comment
You are right, but anyway that's sad :(

As a fellow lover of Rammus, I don't agree. 
His current dance is enjoyable to look at. Having him spin faster and forever, they might as well use his Q animation and turn it sideways.
Gotta dance fast.
Now you're just making me WANT to see them use his Q animation turned sideways.

I like spamming his dance

because it makes him dab

I'm personally disapointed.. Rammus could use some buff next to this update. Rammus old main barely even play him anymore as he get outshined by most of the meta junglers we have now and the rework made it worst.. the self slow made Sejuani bad during her rework process i don't understand why they added it to Rammus.. Adding a fast dance animation won't fix the champion and i find it really aggravating.

Sejuani was broken after her rework...

Rammus was strong before his rework and isn't in a bad spot right now. Can you explain your thought process so I can better understand?

> [{quoted}](name=ChickenWrap,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=J08bP8pk,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2017-06-23T00:58:53.970+0000)
>
> Sejuani was broken after her rework...
> 
> Rammus was strong before his rework and isn't in a bad spot right now. Can you explain your thought process so I can better understand?

Sejuani had a phase during her rework where they added a self slow to her W, and everyone said it was bad so Riot straight removed it. Everyone complained about Rammus self slow, and still are and Riot did nothing about it. They pigeon holed him jungle and he is having a bad time. I used to play Rammus top lane to counter AD heavy top bruiser, i can't any longer, the defense come to the price of 60% slow, and i can't farm minions or use it defensively while running back to my turret without ending like a walking duck. The slow need to be toned down or straight removed.
Rammus isn't in a great spot now. Have you tried playing Rammus now? I think that would answer your own question.
Seriously? Rammus was gutted last patch and this is all we can talk about? This is all a rioter responds to about Rammus? His dance? Wow.

She's on the skins team. Do you want her commenting on balance?
Thats like going to a dealership because your car broke down and complaining to a clerk.

I want her to get someone to address him being gutted and what they plan on doing about it? That would be nice. Nice try on acting like a "lowly little skins team rioter" is useless.

In your cute little scenario, I would expect the clerk to have someone that can help me and talk to me about my car.
Ok but if rammus is having issues, you can bet they're looking at him. It won't be immediately, but eventually. Rammus feels fine to me though. What problems are you having?

Have you tried the new Rammus yet? The W slow is crippling. Honestly I used to level it first but not there's no use to even use it. 60% slow debuff is too harsh. And they took some ulti damage away. Way to pigeon hole me Riot. I just want the old Rammus back.
Yes I have played rammus. He's not _supposed_ to move much when W+E tanking someone. With Cinder and thornmail, they pretty much kill themselves when you press E

> [{quoted}](name=Junglerz Fault,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=J08bP8pk,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-06-21T10:19:19.358+0000)
>
> Seriously? Rammus was gutted last patch and this is all we can talk about? This is all a rioter responds to about Rammus? His dance? Wow.

champs get strong or weak like the tide man, ebb and flow, just like nami
Champs don't just need to get strong or weak MAN. They could just revert the changes and everyone would be happy again. Then no need to accept being weak.
How do  you think us Shaco mains felt? Still feel?
Exactly, shaco could use some love too.
